Can I rent Mercedes with or without a driver?
Yes, you can book a car with a professional driver (pay by the hour), or rent a car without a driver (pay by the day).
<span>Что такое +1 час за подачу автомоб:
What does +1 hour for the car delivery mean?
This includes 30 min round trip to your address and back to the garage.
<span>Какое минимальное количество часов:
What is the minimum car rent time?
From Monday till Thursday - 3 hours. Friday, Saturday - 5 hours. Sunday - 4 hours.
<span>Выезд из Киева оплачивается дополн:
Does the travel outside the city limits cost additional money?
Riding outside the city limits for up to 20 km is paid plus one hour to the cost, over 20 km - the total mileage is paid both ways.
